__TOC__

This is the page of the Ubuntu Media Team.

The media-related activities in Ubuntu are coordinated over here.

* <nowiki>[[Media/Status]]</nowiki> tracks the state of 
** upstream bugs
** codecs we ship
** players we ship
* <nowiki>[[Media/Codecs]]</nowiki> lists all the codecs we 
** have
** want to have
** we will never have
* <nowiki>[[Media/NewSoftware]]</nowiki> tracks software we want to have in.
* <nowiki>[[Media/Team]]</nowiki> lists all our activities.
* <nowiki>[[Media/Testing]]</nowiki>
** lists media-related testing plans
